== Balusseri (CT) (627397) ==

Balusseri (CT) is a town in the [[Quilandy]] taluka of [[Kozhikode]] district with an area of 22.44 sq. km. and harbouring 6810 households with total population of 27363 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kozhikode]] is at a distance of 40 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 455 km. Male population is 12977 and female population is 14386. Scheduled Caste population is 3722 and Scheduled Tribes population is 182. Census Location Code of the town is 627397<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 40 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 40 km. Railway station is at Quilandy at a distance of 15 km.
